version_description: The previous version uses the nav + list + detail template here: https://github.com/PolymerElements/app-layout-templates; We are switching to the standard PSK because the detail section will be handled by an item extension per the iron-list collapse demo here https://github.com/PolymerElements/iron-list/blob/master/demo/collapse.html; the second pane will be handled per the iron-list selection demo here https://github.com/PolymerElements/iron-list/blob/master/demo/selection.html
name: DateNight MovieFinder
description: Find the best movies near you playing today
